comments: I took Brigid for a J-Term class on Leadership. She made the class very interested. The environment encourages discussion and small group work. The material was very enlightening and relevant. I would recommend her to anyone.

EXCELLENT TEACHER! Her style is unique but effective. I looked forward to this class each week. I appreciate her class involvement and I feel that our class gelled as a result of her encouragement. I would strongly encourage anyone to take a class with her! Thank you...
